dcterms:creator: H. Hu
D. Dong
Y. Zhao
D. Lian
Z. Li
S. Gao
dcterms:description: RepCountA dataset is currently the largest and most challenging benchmark for the video TRC task, compiled from fitness videos on YouTube, including a wide range of fitness activities conducted in diverse settings. It features extensive video lengths, significant variations in average motion cycles, and a higher number of repetitive cycles compared to prior datasets.
dcterms:title: RepCountA

dcterms:creator: H. Zhang
X. Xu
G. Han
S. He
dcterms:description: UCFRep dataset is a subset of the UCF101 dataset, including fitness videos and daily life videos. It is used to evaluate model generalization ability without utilizing the train set.
dcterms:title: UCFRep

dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: UCF101 dataset consists of 101 human action classes from videos in the wild, providing a diverse set of actions for training and evaluating action recognition models.
dcterms:title: UCF101
